segments.text: Hey Tina . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was just watching TV . What's going on with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just watched a movie and I'm scared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I saw the Sixth Sense . I didn't know it was going to be so scary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember that . It was a great movie . But it was definitely scary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're not busy , do you want to come over ? I'm afraid to be alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I can come over . What should we do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about if we watch a comedy . I need something to get my mind off the frightening images I have from the Sixth Sense .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I'll get ready and leave . I'll see you in about 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , nothings going to happen . I'll be there real soon .
segments.speaker: S1
